title: Add New Positions on Employee Tx
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be the following Position options added to Employee Transactions:
** Home Clubhouse Attendant
** Visiting Clubhouse Attendant

title: Update the eligible to recall calculations on player profile and MJ rosters for optioned players to be based on the counts toward in season limit
custom_steps:
If a player is traded while on option currently we are checking to see if that is the case and if they are re-optioned within 24 hours of the trade.  Instead we can just check that the current option transaction doesnâ€™t have the â€˜counts against in season limitâ€™ box checked as thats used to indicate this scenario.  There is no need to join in the traded while on option view.

Note: this should not impact an option prior to the season starting - those should still be subject to the first game of season check even if the box isnâ€™t checked (or visible on the TX).

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Location Signed fields on MN Contracts to be required regardless of the Add H
custom_steps:
AC:

* On an MN Contract screen, under the â€œExecution of Contractâ€� section, the Location Signed *Country AND State (if applicable)* dropdowns should be required fields with a *hard error* if:
** Addendum H is included
* On an MN Contract screen, under the â€œExecution of Contractâ€� section, the Location Signed *Country AND State (if applicable)* dropdowns should be required fields with a *soft error* if:
** Addendum H is NOT included
* City fields should remain optional

title: Improve the E-Sign process to allow users to refresh stalled E-sign
custom_steps:
* When a user opens the modal from the add C  again, if its â€˜in progress' we should fire a check to see if its stalled anywhere in the e-sign process
* 'In progress' E-Signs will  show up on the Player E-Sign Widget with the pen icon disabled
* There will be a button that will allow users to  refresh the e-sign process which Brian currently manually runs for them. They should be able to initiate this process from the E-Sign modal, The Player E-Sign Widget or both
* A consideration will be if any e-sign user will have this ability or should this be attached to an existing or new perm

title: SPIKE: Consider using BAM logos in EBIS
custom_steps: EBIS has its own set of logos which are not from BAM. Other EP/BEST systems use BAM logos. Should we do the same to be consistent? Need to look at possible impacts to reports.

title: Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)

title: Add option to prevent drafting non-BOC players/non-redrafts in mock mode in Prod
custom_steps: During the Club mock draft in Production, we instruct users to only draft BOC players or redrafts, but sometimes Clubs donâ€™t realize that they are drafting Club-only players.  On mock draft startup in Prod, we should give an option to allow/disallow Clubs to pick Club-only players.  Thereâ€™s a similar setting on the Draft Test Picker in lower environments.

title: As a League Operations User, I want the Rookie of the Year Eligibility widget to 'roll over'
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* Each year on the Rule 5 system date, the Rookie of the Year Eligibility widget will â€˜roll overâ€™
* Rolling over will remove any player that has satisfied the Eligibility criteria (green check mark players)
* Players that no longer meet population requirements set will be removed

title: As a League Operations User, I want to see what players have recently qualified for Rookie of the Year Eligibility
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a player in the Rookie of the Year Eligibility satisfies the criteria for ROY Eligibility, a green checkmark will be displayed in the ROY Eligible column
* Rookie of the Year Eligible is defined as:
** A player shall be considered a rookie unless he has exceeded any of the following thresholds in a previous season (or seasons): â€¢ 130 at-bats or 50 innings pitched in the Major Leagues. â€¢ 45 total days on an active Major League roster during the Championship Season (excluding time on the Injured List).

title: As a League Operations User, I want to see players in the Rookie of the Year Eligibility widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+of+the+Year+Eligibility+widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* The Rookie of the Year Eligibility widget will be populated with the following players:
** Anyone with 1 Active Day within the past two seasons
** All 40-man roster players that have not yet met Rookie of the Year criteria
* New players that meet the criteria will be added to the widget over night



Active days are defined as:

* Days when a player is added to (selected, recalled) or remains on his Club's 26-man active roster during the championship season for the entire day, unless there is a "post-game" assignment (the "post-game" option / outright is checked for an optional or outright assignment). To clarify, if the player is optioned "post-game", that day counts as an active day. If a player is optioned without the post-game checked, that does not count as an active day. If the player is outrighted "post-game", that day counts as an active day. If a player is outrighted without the post-game checked, that does not count as an active day. An active day will not be counted for any day there is any other transaction for that player (placement to an IL, Paternity or Bereavement List or to any Inactive List (Restricted, Admin Leave, etc.)

title: PERMISSIONS: Rookie of the Year Eligibility
custom_steps:
AC:

* New EBIS-ROY-ELIGIBILITY-WIDGET-VIEWER permission will be created
* New permission will be added to the following roles:
** Major Transactions BOC Admin
** Major Transactions BOC Viewer
** Major Transactions Club Admin
** Major Transactions Club Viewer

title: As a League Operations User, I want to see a new Rookie of the Year Eligibility widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+Eligibility+widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3803152388/Data+Discovery+-+Rookie+Eligibility+widget|smart-link]

Note Widget population will be handled in a future story

title: As an EBIS User, I want to be able to export the MJ/MN Player Info Widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* At the top right of the widget will be a button to Export as either an Excel File or as a PDF
* On either Export, there will be an additional column between the â€œPlayerâ€� and â€œPosâ€� columns labeled â€œPlayer IDâ€�
* This column will be filled with the Player ID of the player for that row
* This column will only appear on the table when exported - not in the actual widget on EBIS

title: As an EBIS User, I want to be able to edit the MJ/MN Player Info widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3825958921/MJ+MN+Player+Info+Widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3825958921/MJ+MN+Player+Info+Widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* The MJ/MN Player Info widget will contain the following columns:
** Player
*** Last, Roster First
*** Not editable
** Pos
*** Dropdown
** Phone
*** Dropdown for phone type
*** Textbox (only digits allowed)
** Email
*** Textbox
** Height
*** Separate dropdowns for feet & inches within the column
** Weight
*** Textbox (only digits allowed)
** Uniform #
*** Textbox (only digits allowed)
** Equal Opportunity
*** Dropdown
** Agent
*** Search Bar
** Agency
*** Dropdown
* Players will be sorted in alphabetical order by last name
* At the bottom of the widget will be an â€œEditâ€� button
** None of the fields will  become editable until this button is selected
* At the bottom of the widget will be a â€œSaveâ€� button
** This will default to be unclickable
** This button will become clickable once any edits are made
** Selecting this button will save all changes made on the widget
* At the bottom of the widget will be a â€œCancelâ€� button
** Selecting this button will undo any changes made to the widget while in editing mode

title: As an EBIS User, I want to be able to filter the teams on the "MJ/MN Player Info" widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* On this widget, there will be a dropdown filter with every Org
** Only BOC will be able to edit this filter
*** The filter will default to ARI for BOC
** The filter will default to (and be uneditable for) whatever Org is logged in
* To the right of the Org dropdown, there will be a dropdown filter with every Club
** The filter will default to â€œAll Clubsâ€� for both BOC and Orgs
** The dropdown population will be:
*** All MN Clubs from the selected Org
* Teams will only be able to view players/clubs from their own Org on this screen

title: As an EBIS User, I want a new "Roster Details" tab on the Rosters dashboard
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new tab on the Rosters dashboard called â€œRoster Detailsâ€�
* The tab will fall under the Partner League tab
* On this tab will be a â€œMJ/MN Player Infoâ€� widget

title: As a League Economics Admin, I want to a new batch to deliver UPC PDFs nightly to the MLBPA via BOX
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new nightly batch that delivers the contract pdfs to a BOX instance for the MLBPA to consume
* The population of contracts will include Approved Major League and Minor League contracts
* This batch will feature the same 7 day delay that the MLBPA Transactions feed has
** The batch will run nightly but only provide contracts that were approved 7 days earlier
* The file names will include the EBIS ID, Player Name, and an MJ/MN Indicator



BOX details to come.

title: When a submitted partner portal request with additional pending requests is cancelled or expired move the next pending request to submitted
custom_steps: When a player has a submitted partner portal request and additional pending submission requests and the initial request is expired or cancelled before its approved by the partner league president the next pending submission should be changed to submitted rather than approved.

title: As a CEP Player, I want to be able to see my Usage on the Portal
custom_steps:
Desktop Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392852c04c6aaa4ff5f9df|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392852c04c6aaa4ff5f9df|smart-link]

* There will be a collapsable section labeled â€œYour Usageâ€�
* Expanding this section will reveal three tabs:
** Commitment
** Used
** Remaining
* The default will be to show the screen on the â€œCommitmentâ€� tab
* The system should pull from EBIS to fill in the relevant dollar amounts
* The Commitment, Used, and Remaining tables will have the following columns:
** Tuition Allowance
** Living Allowance
* The Commitment table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Per Semester
** Questers
** Per Quarter
** Total Commitment
** Total IPB Offset
** 10 Year Expiration
* The Used table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Amount
** Quarters
** Amount
** Total Amount Used
* The Remaining table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Per Semester
** Quarters
** Per Quarter
** Estimated Balance
* The portal should be linked to playerâ€™s CEP/CSP EBIS statuses to populate accurate data
